description: Surrogate unique identifier for this profile-based work order status transition rule.
Identifier of the user profile or role to which this transition rule applies; likely references a profile master.
Source work order status code from which a transition is permitted for the specified profile.
Target work order status code allowed when moving from the source status for the specified profile.
System-maintained timestamp of the most recent update to this record.
User identifier or name that performed the latest update; likely redundant with user_id_modifiedâ€”confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who created this record.
Date and time when this record was created.
Identifier of the user who last modified this record.
Date and time of the most recent modification to this record.
